original_title: ’Sisu Sariya’ bus service: Govt. to charge 30% of fare from parents
original_body_lines: A proposal has been tabled for the government to provide 70 per cent of the cost of the “Sisu Seriya” school bus service and the balance 30 per cent of the fare to be charged from the parents, Cabinet spokesman Minister Bandula Gunawardana said.
He said the government is unable to sustain the cost of the service due to the current economic constraints.
